General.Name: Shanghai Sinotec Co Ltd
General.Description: Shanghai Sinotec (Group) Co., Ltd. develops, produces, and sells auto parts in China. The company offers turbocharger bleed valve components, turbine and intermediate casings, end cones, elbows, flanges, and other components, as well as pressure, temperature, speed, position, and other sensor products. It also produces process covering precision, sand casting, machining, and other welding assemblies. The company exports its products to North America and Europe. Shanghai Sinotec (Group) Co., Ltd. was founded in 2006 and is based in Shanghai, China.
